pli-tv-pvr2.5:5.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.5:5.2: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.5:5.3: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato …
pli-tv-pvr2.5:6.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.5:6.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ catūhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.5:6.3: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.5:6.4: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.5:6.5: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr2.5:6.6: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
